definition.name: mass_counterterm
definition.definition: In the construction of the Phi^4_3 measure, the mass counterterm delta_m_eps^2 is a divergent renormalization constant (proportional to lambda^2 log(1/eps)) added to the interaction V_eps(phi) = lambda integral :phi_eps^4: dx + delta_m_eps^2 integral :phi_eps^2: dx to ensure convergence of the regularized measures mu_eps as the UV cutoff eps -> 0.
